ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: The package is internally used by https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite
The package is internally used by https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite
The package is internally used by https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite

name: biotraj

about.summary: The package is internally used by https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite
The package is internally used by https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  version: 1.2.2

package:
  name: biotraj
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotraj/archive/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: cc692e8048c5625d20996162b2c1d332b5b626dbc121b3d1a73f1eb546af2b7a

build:
  number: 2
  skip: match(python, "<3.10")
  script:
    - if: not win
      then: export SETUPTOOLS_SCM_PRETEND_VERSION=${{ version }}
    - if: win
      then: set SETUPTOOLS_SCM_PRETEND_VERSION=${{ version }}
    - ${{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: python
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: cython >=3.0
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then: numpy >=2.0
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler("cxx") }}
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools >=64
    - setuptools_scm >=8
    - wheel >=0.30
    - cython >=3.0
    - numpy >=2.0
  run:
    - python
    - numpy >=1.26
    - scipy >=1.13

tests:
  - files:
      source:
        - tests/
    requirements:
      run:
        - pytest
        - netcdf4
    script:
      - pytest

about:
  license: LGPL-2.1-only
  license_file: LICENSE.rst
  summary: The package is internally used by https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite
  homepage: https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotraj/
  repository: https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotraj

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - padix-key
    - JHKru

about.summary: The package is internally used by https://github.com/biotite-dev/biotite
